title: MPH: Radio calls hinted at Norris conspiracy â€” if you didn't spot the hidden meanings
summary: McLaren's radio calls to Lando Norris were wildly misinterpreted at Spa, as F1 viewers missed the hidden meanings in Norris's messages and actions that activated various pre-agreed strategies.Mark Hughesexplains

qa_pairs.question: What does the term 'pre-agreed strategies' refer to in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Strategies that teams and drivers plan in advance to respond to different race scenarios.
wrong_options: Random strategies decided during the race
Strategies based solely on driver preference

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Lando Norris drive for during the Spa race mentioned?
What is the significance of radio communication between drivers and teams in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It allows teams to provide real-time information and instructions to optimize performance.
wrong_options: It can only be used during pit stops
